沖.definition: (of water) to dash against; to mix with water; to infuse; to rinse; to flush; to develop (a film); to rise in the air; to clash; to collide with

沖刷.definition: to cleanse; to scrub; to scour; to wash down; to erode; to wash away

沖劑.definition: medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)

沖天.definition: (lit. and fig.) to soar; to shoot upwards

沖挹.definition: to defer to; to be submissive

沖擊.definition: variant of 衝擊|冲击[chong1 ji1]

沖昏頭腦.definition: lit. to be muddled in the brain (idiom); fig. excited and unable to act rationally; to go to one's head

沖服.definition: to take medicine in solution; infusion

沖服劑.definition: dose of medicine to be taken in solution; infusion

沖泡.definition: to add water (or other liquid) to (another ingredient such as powdered milk or tea leaves); to infuse (tea)

沖洗.definition: to rinse; to wash; (photography) to develop (film)

沖調.definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc

沖賬.definition: (accounting) to strike a balance; to reverse an entry; to write off

沖銷.definition: (accounting) to charge against; to write off

沖齡.definition: childhood (typically used in reference to an emperor)
